sentences.sContent: Grains are sold by the bushel.
Wheat averages 56 pounds to a bushel.
sentences.sCn: 小麦平均 56 磅为一蒲式耳。

sentences.sContent: Corn in Chicago has jumped 45 percent this year and traded at $6.035 a bushel today, while wheat has gained 41 percent and soybeans have rallied 27 percent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Corn in Chicago has jumped 45 percent this year and traded at $6.035 a bushel today, while wheat has gained 41 percent and soybeans have rallied 27 percent.
sentences.sCn: 在芝加哥，今年的玉米价格已经涨了45%到6.035美元一蒲式耳（体积单位），而小麦和大豆价格分别上涨了：41%和27%。

trans.tranOther: A bushel is a unit of volume that is used for measuring agricultural produce such as corn or beans. A bushel is equivalent in volume to eight gallons \(35.2 litres\).
